The input does not consist solely of whitespace characters, and it includes punctuation (periods at the end of each sentence). Based on the specifications provided, this input complies fully with all the requirements: it is a paragraph with more than three sentences, contains text, and is properly formatted with sentences separated by punctuation.

OK
